item.title: Report E-2024110029
item.description:
Report E-2024110029

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-06T12:32:05+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: NORTHBOROUGH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered a jerrican that was slightly leaking. Further investigation revealed that a nail from the pallet the jerrican was staged on had punctured the bottom of the jerrican contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was neutralized and cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured jerrican.

item.title: Report E-2024110028
item.description:
Report E-2024110028

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-06T12:32:05+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-11
  • City: NORTHBOROUGH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While loading freight into a trailer, forklift operator was carrying a pallet that the forkblades were slightly sticking out of. When he went to place the pallet into the trailer a forkblade struck a drum that already was staged in the trailer consequently puncturing it contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was contained and neutralized and cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured drum.

item.title: Report I-2024100081
item.description:
Report I-2024100081

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-05T12:22:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-06
  • City:
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DELTA AIR LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 09/06/2024, during cruise phase of flight DL835 (BOS-DFW), a passenger's vape pen was observed to be smoking. Water was applied to mitigate the release. The flight continued to destination without further incident. No flight crew or customer injuries were reported. The NRG and FAA were notified.
